name: MY SYSTEM IS GETTING HACKED
description:
Ludum Dare 42 - Running out of space

MY SYSTEM IS GETTING HACKED is a fast-paced shooter in which you fight against hacking drones that want to kill you.

Each drone will block your vision by hacking your goggles.
Every time you kill an enemy a square of its color gets deleted and you can get rid of much more squares and get a score boost by killing multiple enemies in a row.
There is also multiple secret color chains that give you a bonus if you kill 5 drones in a certain order.

Controls :
WASD / ZQSD - Move
Mouse - Look
Left click - Fire
Escape - Quit

Made by Constantin Liétard, Thomas Denis and Clara Coolen

OSX & Linux builds are untested
